formulas.name: Clear_special_characters_from_aliases
formulas.expression: LEFT(MID({!Aliases_Template}, 2, LEN({!Aliases_Template}) - 2), FIND(",", MID({!Aliases_Template}, 2, LEN({!Aliases_Template}) - 2)) - 1) & MID(MID({!Aliases_Template}, 2, LEN({!Aliases_Template}) - 2), FIND(",", MID({!Aliases_Template}, 2, LEN({!Aliases_Template}) - 2)) + 1, LEN(MID({!Aliases_Template}, 2, LEN({!Aliases_Template}) - 2)) - FIND(",", MID({!Aliases_Template}, 2, LEN({!Aliases_Template}) - 2)))

formulas.description: Add 19 days to the date given by user
formulas.name: WorkingDays
formulas.expression: CASE( MOD( {!InputDate} - DATE(1985, 6, 24), 7 ), 0, CASE( MOD({!InputDate} + 24 - DATE(1985, 6, 24), 7), 5, {!InputDate} + 26, 6, {!InputDate} + 25, {!InputDate} + 24 ), 1, CASE( MOD({!InputDate} + 24 - DATE(1985, 6, 24), 7), 5, {!InputDate} + 26, 6, {!InputDate} + 25, {!InputDate} + 24 ), 2, CASE( MOD({!InputDate} + 24 - DATE(1985, 6, 24), 7), 5, {!InputDate} + 26, 6, {!InputDate} + 25, {!InputDate} + 24 ), 3, CASE( MOD({!InputDate} + 24 - DATE(1985, 6, 24), 7), 5, {!InputDate} + 26, 6, {!InputDate} + 25, {!InputDate} + 24 ), 4, CASE( MOD({!InputDate} + 26 - DATE(1985, 6, 24), 7), 5, {!InputDate} + 28, 6, {!InputDate} + 27, {!InputDate} + 26 ), 5, CASE( MOD({!InputDate} + 26 - DATE(1985, 6, 24), 7), 5, {!InputDate} + 28, 6, {!InputDate} + 27, {!InputDate} + 26 ), 6, CASE( MOD({!InputDate} + 25 - DATE(1985, 6, 24), 7), 5, {!InputDate} + 27, 6, {!InputDate} + 26, {!InputDate} + 25 ), {!InputDate} )
